hadiths.text: Narrated Umaymah daughter of Ruqayqah: The Prophet (ﷺ) had a wooden vessel under his bed in which he would urinate at night

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَبُولُ بِاللَّيْلِ فِي الإِنَاءِ ثُمَّ يَضَعُهُ عِنْدَهُ
chapter.eng-name: The Permissibility Of A Man Urinating In A Vessel During The Night, And Placing It Near Him
